message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you. To kick things off, I'm proposing a price of $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit below my asking price. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $11,000 for the product?
